author: wn.com
title: List of credit institutions with appointed authorised representatives of the Bank of Russia (Central Bank of Russia)
text: ( Source : Central Bank of Russia ) Authorised representatives of the Bank of Russia , acting in compliance with Article 76 of Federal Law 'On the Central Bank of the Russian Federation (Bank of Russia) were appointed to 158 credit institutions
